CustomField.formula: CASE(TEXT( Utility_Meter_Read_Pooling__c ), 'applicable meter read/pooling fees',1, '$5.00 per facility per month', 5, '$1.50 per facility per month', 1.50, '$10.00 per facility per month', 10, '$15.00 per facility per month', 15, NULL )
CustomField.label: Utility Meter Read Pooling Formula
